GClasses::GSelfOrganizingMap

GClasses::GSelfOrganizingMap Class Reference

An implementation of a Kohonen map. More...

#include <GSelfOrganizingMap.h>

Inheritance diagram for GClasses::GSelfOrganizingMap:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 GSelfOrganizingMap (int nMapDims, int nMapWidth, GRand *pRand)
 nMapDims specifies the number of dimensions for the map. nMapWidth specifies the size in one dimension of the map. (so if nMapDims is 3 and nMapWidth is 10, the map will contain 1000 (10^3) nodes.)

Detailed Description

An implementation of a Kohonen map.

int  nMapWidth,
GRand *  pRand

nMapDims specifies the number of dimensions for the map. nMapWidth specifies the size in one dimension of the map. (so if nMapDims is 3 and nMapWidth is 10, the map will contain 1000 (10^3) nodes.)
